All sites require to have Internet connection. It could a cable, wifi or mobile data in your plan. The mobile editions are made to spend less data than the online version. In the same time you will have access to all races, odds and promotions.

It's a nice alternative for betting when you are on the venue and watch the races. Just get your mobile and place the bets. There is no such great opportunity and it's one of the privileges to live in 21st century.

However, the biggest advantage of these mobile sites is that you can use on absolutely any type of mobile phone or tablet. They work also on old school devices and some rare. You can use them with iPhone, iPad, Android, Blackberry, Nokia, Windows, Samsung, HTC and many others.
